places_with_reviews.name: Anandvan Resort
address: Ghatghar Road, Bhandardara, Shendi, Shendi Bhandardhara, Maharashtra 414601, India

reviews.text:
One of the most beautiful resorts I have visited, if you are a nature lover and want some peaceful time you must visit this place.
I went there for my husband's birthday .They have helped me to plan the surprise for him, special thanks to Nisha.
The rooms were very nice, we booked a tree top nest for 2 days, it was wonderful.
The staff is very kind and helpful, you may find locals from nearby towns as a staff working on campus (very sweet people).
Food is a little expensive but worth a single penny. The chef comes personally to all the tables for the feedback.
Their bakery products are also delicious.

The only things that I missed during my 2 day stay are Spa and Bathtub. They should have it.

Cons:
Not ideal for elderly. It has many steps to reach some of the rooms.

Wonderful experience and great hospitality!!!
We stayed in a garden studio to celebrate birthday.
The rooms were clean and well maintained. The location is just awesome surrounded with lot of greenery.
The staff is very polite and helpful. They went out of the way to plan and execute lot of surprises on my birthday. A big thank you to Nishi at the reception.
The food is great but a tad expensive. The chef personally ensures that all your food cravings are met.
All in all we really enjoyed our stay.
It is pet friendly too!
There's only one negative point about the resort - they don't have a good swimming pool!

Amazing place and experience! The resort is calm and beautiful. The rooms are cozy and the view is surreal from the tree house room. The food is great! A wide variety.
Special thanks to Chef Arun who made it even better with extraordinary culinary skills.

A must place to try!
Great place to enjoy vacation. Beautiful garden with views. Both sunrise and sunset could be enjoyed from resort itself. Dining experience of amazing. Loved it absolutely. Must go with family.

It's one of those offbeat quiet resorts where you can go to when you want to disconnect from the outer world. Great food, though a little pricey, but the location is beautiful. They have limited menu for now but considering it's a recent opening from the group, they're working on including more amenities and food options. The staff is very helpful and assists you with all your requirements. You can walk across the property, which is lush green and also can walk down to the dam, on banks of which this is located. All in all, a good place for a weekend getaway.

places_with_reviews.name: Wildroots Bhandardara

reviews.text:
We went with parents and it was good experience. The rooms were decent and the resort was good. Hospitality was also good. The river was dry due to summer and I am sure it would be worth visiting again during or after monsoon.
The weather is hot right now and hence can't be out during noon.
We also went for boating in the nearby lake.
Food was good but found it costly. Breakfast was only included in our package.
Overall staff was very nice and accomodating.
Would recommend if you want to chill for a day or two.

Wildroots exceeded my expectations! Arrived on a bike ride and was greeted with refreshing kokam juice, setting the tone for a fantastic experience. Rooms were sparkling clean, the food was to die for - kudos to the chef for their culinary skills! The riverside seating provided a soothing ambiance. Overall, a superb experience that left me longing to return!

The resort has a perfect calming feel to it. Service and attention by the staff was very comforting. Especial mention to Mr. Yash Trivedi who can be seen interacting with every guest personally and ensuring they are comfortable and having a good time.
Rooms are good and clean but rated 4 only because they are best for a couple due to size plus they occasionally are troubled by electricity issues which I believe the management is trying to resolve permanently.

Food is good especially the local cuisine. We did not get a lot of chance to taste more dishes by the chef this time so will return for more during monsoon when the place will be at its full glory.

Wildroots, what an experience. Calm, peace and serenity. Bestest staff. Beautiful rooms, well maintained garden and finger licking food. If anyone is looking for a place to get away from the usual hectic schedule and wanna be close to nature, this is the place. Cool Breeze from the river is an icing specially in this summer. Best part of all is that it is a pet friendly resort. What more can we ask for. My dog, Myra had her best time in Wildroots. Thanks to Yash and the whole team of Wildroots for making our stay a memorable one. Looking forward to going there again.

It was amazing experience, value for money place and meals. The staff is quiet helpful and friendly. Rooms very clean. Great place to stay for one night for a calm and peaceful vacation. Everything was top notch like rooms, service and meals. Would surely recommend others as well to visit if looking for a relaxing place.

places_with_reviews.name: MTDC Bhandardhara

reviews.text:
We had booked the premium Lake view suites.
Very spacious rooms.
The rooms are not as luxurious as a regular 5 star hotel, however they are very well maintained.
The staff was helpful and had a very nice attitude.
Food was surprisingly good.
We used to order lunch sand dinner in the room and would enjoy the food at our dining table in the room, all the whole looking at the lake.
The view was awesome. One can sit on the bed and gaze at the lake for the full day.
The view is the best part about this place.
Ultimately it is an MTDC experience that you will get here.

Awesome place to stay here. Very much peace.
Restaurant food delicious, tea was great. Very polite and good staff.

I would be more happy if you remove that 10% extra charges for room service.
Great place for leisure trips. This place is well maintained by MTDC. Spacious rooms, good food and good ambiance around even in winter seasons. Only one and main thing missing is the swimming pool..
We were here for breakfast ride. The location is really beautiful with a good lake view and food was okay.

It was comfy stay for 2 nights. We had opted for Lakview Spl Room Non AC which had a fantastic view of the Arthur Lake. Kettle wire was broken, washroom door lock was not functioning, thankfully had a latch.

Food was decent nothing wow as such, don't have high expectations. Also, there aren't much options of restaurants.

Google map location isn't accurate, so pls ask for directions as you reach closer.

places_with_reviews.name: The Yash Resort | By Cotton Stays
address: Akole Taluk, Bhandardara, Shendi Bhandardhara, Maharashtra 414604, India

reviews.text: They don't know the rates of their own packages! There are two contact numbers provided. One person had confirmed a room will cost 5k for 2 nights inclusive of all meals. I had confirmed the rate atleast twice on call. When I contacted the other number for final confirmation before booking, they mentioned it's 5k per night. Absolutely pathetic.

It was a very great experience but it had just one problem which was the hot water shower in the room.When ever I used to turn on the shower it gave either very hot water or very cold and if I turn on the both water options it still used to give me ice cold water. But still the service and location were great and I loved the experience. In which the pool was the greatest experience in the resort. I would suggest you to go if you want some rest from all the stress and work as it is on the outskirts of the city.

Yash resort is one of the best resort that I have visited.. Rooms are spacious & clean, Ambiance is cozy, safe & peaceful, Food is good in taste, they serve buffet for breakfast, lunch & dinner with amazing varieties in veg & non-veg. Lots of indoor & outdoor games options are available. And the most wonderful thing about the resort was its staff & service. All of them were very generous & supportive. My entire family of 8 members had a great & refreshing time. We went there on 24th.. as it was Christmas they also arranged DJ.. it was a Fab night.. If anyone is planning to visit Bhandardara I would definitely recommend Yash resort for a comfortable & safe stay

Place is nice & quiet. Room are spacious and clean, staff is very friendly & welcoming. Cost is economical.

Property is green & have swimming pool.

I stayed here with family & my dog booked by paw adventure company, everything was fine.. food was good service was good, room was neat & clean but only thing which was Disappointing was OVERPRICED FOOD, ALCOHOL & WATER THE BASIC NEED is unreasonably OVER PRICED.. Water bottle is Rs 50/-
Basic Al-carta lunch for will cost u Rs 1000/- per person, I don't understand why water bottle is sold above MRP ? Plz make sure that u get everything from outside & don't buy anything from this Resort

places_with_reviews.name: Anand Sarovar Bhandardara
address: 241, Golwad Vasti Road, Murshet, Akole, Maharashtra 422604, India

reviews.text:
We visited this in April 2024.
Location is awesome.
Rooms are good, with huge balcony.
Food is good at anandsarovar but can be improved. Anandvan had really good food in 2019, not sure about recent times.
Staff and services are great, no issues at all.
I found this place kids and old friendly.

If you want to visit this property, visit it for its location and ambience.

14-17 Dec 2023 . Just back from a very relaxing and invigorating stay at Anand Sarovar Resort . Excellent location with excellent service. Spacious rooms , Top notch cleanliness all around within the resort. Very helpful staff , taking good care of we senior citizens. The food was all freshly prepared and all meals were delicious and had many choices.
A special thanks to the Chef who catered to our taste in a very personal manner.
One star I’m giving less now is to just convey my message that the resort has to be made senior citizen friendly with railings near steps and towards the boat ride.Though the staff was ever ready to give a helping hand.Loved the karaoke and singing nights by Yash . Everything added to the ambience of subtle luxury and celebrations.Thank you once again , will surely come back.

I had a fantastic two-day stay at Hotel Anand Sarovar in Bhandardara. The resort is impressive with fabulous rooms offering stunning lake views. The food was delicious, and the well-maintained lawn added to the overall charm. The inclusion of a smart TV in the room was a great touch. The staff was not only friendly but also took excellent care of us throughout our stay. Highly recommend this wonderful experience!

Launched only in Oct'23, Anand Sarovar is a front view lakeside resort with the backdrop of a small hill. If you plan to travel from Pune, get off the highway only in Sangamner otherwise the poor condition of the roads will spoil your journey.

Welcome drinks were served when we reached around noon. Rooms are medium sized, a big balcony with a couple chairs. Rooms were clean and ready to move in; a distinct aroma in the room elevated out spirits. Scenic view of the lake from our room was blissful. This was only meliorated by the Natural Auroras at dawn and dusk.

Lakeside lunch galvanized with quick service and tasty food was a treat for our taste buds.

Some board games helped us rekindle the child within us.

As the evening grew upon us, the Karaoke session by a bonfire allowed us to stretch our legs and music was symphony to our ears.

The temperature dropped as dinner time approached so we decided to have dinner in our Balcony. The room service was quick to respond to our calls.

It was a wonderful experience and would've love to stay another night.

There should've been a fridge to store leftover food. Having said that, I'd discount this as the resort is only a few months into operation.

An excellent place with picturesque beauty, divine serenity in terms of natural lake view and Sunrise makes oneself feel highly rejuvenating. An ideal place to stay with nature which is refreshing having beautiful rooms, delicious food, warm hospitality and services and entertainment resources that every member of family enjoys.

places_with_reviews.name: Wanderlust Resort bhandardara
address: Ghoti Rajur Road, near Waaki Bunglow, Bhandardara, Maharashtra 422604, India

reviews.text: I'm so amazed by the top notch service provided at Wanderlust Resort. The food is amazing! The rooms are decent and very clean having mesmerizing view. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.Everything was up-to the required standard and quite ambient.

I'm so amazed by the top notch service provided at  Wanderlust Resort. The food  is Wow! The rooms are decent and very clean having mesmerizing view. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.Everything was up-to  the required standard. All thanks to the owner Mr Sourabh Singh and his team for that amazing generosity,you made us feel welcome from the moment we walked through your door till the last day of our stay.I must say if you are  planning to book a stay here, then directly contact the hotel reception for hassle free experience and they will be glad to assist you in every possible way.

I along with my entire family spent New Year at Bhandardara to celebrate the holiday. There I booked in Wanderlust Resort. Stayed for 3 days. Enjoyed a lot. New Year Party, DJ Night, Gala Dinner was everything. I heartily thank the team of Wanderlust.

Visited wanderlust resort really enjoyed their services . Wonderful experience it was !!! Will visit again in monsoon .Good ambience and environment. my stay was of 2 days but really enjoyed it ❤️❤️❤️

When I was booking this hotel, first of all I looked at the reviews of the hotel. Many of the reviews were good but many of the reviews were also bad, so I called the hotel reception and inquired from there that I came to know that during the time of Covid. Wanderlust had given its management to someone else to run it, due to which many reviews were bad, that is why Wanderlust has taken over the management again, so now there is no problem and we are making many things better. The management has changed in December 2023, so that's why I started booking. I actually went there and experienced it myself. The staff is so good, the food is so amazing and the location is also close to Kalsubai Peak, you can even say close to Randawaterfall In the middle, we stayed there with the whole family. Had a lot of fun together and we thank the team at Wanderlust. Thanks to their hospitality and tell everyone that yes, don't go to the reviews and experience it yourself, Wanderlust has very good management.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel New Samadhan
address: At/Po:- Shendi Bhandardara, Bhandardara, Shendi, Maharashtra 422604, India

reviews.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel New Samadhan , and it was an excellent experience from start to finish.
Hospitality is at its highest level! The atmosphere, vibes and energy are calm, relaxing. A great mood is created by the aura. Very delightful, a grateful experience.
We stayed here for lunch but it was quite a great place ,rooms were cool and food was great

One of the best places to dine. The waiters Are very humble and friendly and serve you with all their heart. We had lunch and chilled out in the garden area in a swing tied to the trees. It was a peaceful experience. The hotel is little tough to find as it is located in a secluded location on a hilltop.
Ordered veg thali and special veg thali in their restaurant. Both were good

Food quality & Quantity was okay. But the washroom is pathetic means you may can not even think to use it, there is no lock for door of washroom & door was broken, inside wash room lots of tobaco pan masala spilt marks, lot of mud inside.

places_with_reviews.name: Bhandardara camping

reviews.text:
Food quality and quantity both are awesome.
Rooms were very clean and well maintained.
Camp site was very good, it was more then what we expected.
People were very polite and humble to the visitors.

Embark on a journey to the Bhandardara Lakeside Camping and spot various stars and galaxies at night

Stay in well maintained tents with mattresses, pillows, and blankets to keep you warm

Enjoy a calm boating ride to take in the serenity of the setting and to see the panoramic views of the lake

Sit around a bonfire, listen to live music, eat tasty snacks and have a wonderful evening

If you want to have a good camping experience with your family and loved ones then this is a perfect campsite. The place is peaceful and lovely.

Service provided by the coordinators is also very good. So far one of the best experience than any other campsites.
Best camping site had great experience and great service

I owe this wonderful man Keshav & his family a review with thanks.
Their hospitality is zenith and their kitchen is Akshayapatra, you ask something and they have a way of getting it. Veg and non-Veg and any customisation is possible. Very polite and hardworking family.

The rooms are well maintained and the view is scenic. You can feel the distant waterfalls around you.
We were 5 families and it was last mansoon season we visited from Hyderabad.
Couldn't enjoy night stay in tents due to rain yet the room stay turned out to be awesome and romantic. Our kids loved every moment of the whole trip.
Last but not the least, this village is full of water falls of all sizes.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Amruteshwar
address: Maharashtra State Highway 44, Shendi Bhandardhara, Maharashtra 422604, India

reviews.text: Nice hotel for enjoying with good food and good lake side place also they have garden seating area,there room are also awesome this is my third time I’m visiting do visit with your friends……

Awesome food and affordable rates. Must try Dal-fry, Baingan masala and Chhans..They do not serve already pre-cooked food. They take order and then serve you fresh food. Everything was tasty and delicious. Ample parking. Service is good and not greedy.
Reasonable rate, clean rooms, fresh and delicious food both veg and non veg.staff was helpful and polite.
Location is Good,food quality was awesome and they also have lake side camping do visit your friend.......

The place is just awesome ... with aome amazing food and VIEW...

LOVELY PLACE FOR A NICE WEEKEND

places_with_reviews.name: Surya Resort
address: HQ84+FR9, Bhandardara - Ghoti Rd, Chichondi, Maharashtra 422604, India

reviews.text: Great food , nice location and amazing view. The food is lip smacking and location is easily accessible. 5/5 for the hospitality.
The location of the resort is the best as it’s situated near the mountains and the green farms! Even the food is really tasty and authentic here plus the staff is very warm and welcoming.
We just went there for lunch. The service is horrible as well as the food.
The taste was good. Service was quick. Jice location.

The resort is very nice, the management of the resort is very nice, the food in the resort is delicious. It is a very nice place to stay for family. The cleanliness of the resort is very good, definitely visit it once. In the resort Mr.Ganesh ji is very great and helping person.he is helping to all customers.because my car is fall down near kalsubai treak Mr Ganesh sir arreging another car for my family..
